result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Fond du lac Co Jail - (Jury Trial 02/02/2023 at 8:00 AM)
Jury trial - 12 person on February 2, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on December 13, 2022 at 03:00 pm. / Instructions for How to Appear Remotely (emailed to FDL Cty Jail)

2:31 PM Defendant KEVIN J MEILAHN appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Erik C. Johnson appeared by video for KEVIN J MEILAHN.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Court is also appearing remotely from Marquette County. Atty Johnson has not been able to talk with the defendant and requests a break-out room. Court recess at 2:33 PM. Court recalls case at 2:35 PM. Appearances remain the same. Statement by Atty Johnson, the defendant has another case in FDL that is scheduled for trial in December and requests a date after that. Statement by ADA McElroy. Statement by the Court. Atty Johnson states this matter can be put on the trial calendar. Statement by ADA - need to check with the analyst on the other case. Court sets for Jury Trial on February 2, 2023 and for Final Pretrial Conference via zoom on December 13, 2022 at 3:00 PM. All motions in limine, jury instructions, verdicts etc to be filed by the end of the day on December 6, 2022.

Court adjourned at 2:41 PM.
Status hearing on September 27, 2022 at 02:30 pm. / Instructions for How to Appear Remotely (emailed to FDL Co Jail)

2:42 PM Defendant KEVIN J MEILAHN appeared by video.  Attorney Erik C. Johnson in court for KEVIN J MEILAHN.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Statement by Atty Johnson - defendant is on a hold and has another case in Fond du lac. Court will set for Status Hearing on September 27, 2022 at 2:30 PM via zoom.

Court adjourned at 2:44 PM
Status hearing on July 19, 2022 at 02:15 pm. / Instructions for How to Appear Remotely (emailed to FDL Co jail)

1:46 PM Defendant KEVIN J MEILAHN appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Erik C. Johnson appeared by video for KEVIN J MEILAHN.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Court also appears remotely from Marquette County. Attorney Johnson acknowledges receipt of the information and waives any reading. Statement by ADA McElroy - just received the blood results and will be amending the information. Atty Johnson has no objection. Court goes over the information and penalties. Atty Johnson enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant. Statement by Atty Johnson regarding status and new court date. Court will set for Status Hearing on July 19, 2022 at 2:15 PM - defendant via zoom.

Court adjourned at 1:51 PM
Status hearing scheduled for July 19, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Arraignment on June 14, 2022 at 01:45 pm. / Instructions for How to Appear Remotely (emailed to FDL Co Jail)
